item.title: AWS VPC best practises
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: Super detailed and practical VPC design best practises - very cool stuff..

item.title: Urban Giants
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description:
Beautifully shot, mind blowing short documentary about New York’s early telecoms buildings, the Western Union Building and the AT&T Long Lines Building ..

Found via BldBlog site

item.title: Solomon Hykes, Dockercon14
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: Solomon Hykes, creator of Docker, speaking at Dockercon - paints a nicely detailed overview of all the new Docker ecosystem libraries released recently - Libcontainer, Libchan, and Libswarm - basically all middle layer abstractions which seem to have buy across all the main platforms and providers. He starts talking about 10mins in..

item.title: Eric Brewer on Container usage at Google
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description:
Eric Brewer’s keynote from Dockercon14 -

Crazy stuff, definitely feels like Containers have gained mass momentum, and we’re about to undergo a major shift in Systems Architecture. Very exciting times!
